questions.question: Sam Altman is best known for leading which AI lab?
questions.explain: Sam Altman serves as CEO of OpenAI.

questions.question: Demis Hassabis co-founded which research organization?
questions.explain: Demis Hassabis co-founded DeepMind, later acquired by Google.

questions.question: Satya Nadella has been CEO of which technology company?
questions.explain: Satya Nadella became Microsoft CEO in 2014.

questions.question: Theo Browne is closely associated with which developer-focused stack?
questions.explain: Theo Browne popularizes the T3 Stack (Next.js, tRPC, Tailwind, Prisma).

questions.question: Fei-Fei Li is widely known for co-leading which dataset effort?
questions.explain: Fei-Fei Li helped launch ImageNet, a landmark computer vision dataset.

questions.question: Linus Torvalds initiated which operating system kernel?
questions.explain: Linus Torvalds created the Linux kernel in 1991.

questions.question: Guido van Rossum created which programming language?
questions.explain: Guido van Rossum authored Python in the late 1980s.

questions.question: Andrew Ng co-founded which online learning platform centered on tech and ML?
questions.explain: Andrew Ng launched Coursera with Daphne Koller in 2012.

questions.question: Which leader is shown in this portrait?
questions.explain: The placeholder portrait represents Sam Altman.

questions.question: Identify the executive shown in the portrait.
questions.explain: The placeholder portrait maps to Satya Nadella.

questions.question: Which AI lab co-founder does this portrait represent?
questions.explain: The placeholder portrait is labeled for Demis Hassabis.

questions.question: This portrait corresponds to which developer advocate?
questions.explain: The placeholder is assigned to Theo Browne of the T3 community.

questions.question: Which company recently announced the arrival of Xbox Copilot on Windows 11 PCs worldwide?
questions.explain: Microsoft launched Xbox Copilot for Windows 11, enhancing the gaming experience for users.

questions.question: What recent initiative did DACLab succeed in regarding CO2 reduction?
choices: B. Using less electricity than competitors
C. Building a new power plant
D. Reducing the need for CO2 capture
questions.explain: DACLab claims it can remove CO2 using less electricity than many of its competitors, marking a significant development in carbon capture technology.

questions.question: Which notable filmmaker expressed concerns about the creative capabilities of AI in comparison to humans?
questions.explain: James Cameron stated that while AI can be creative, it lacks the 'unique lived experience' that humans possess.

questions.question: What is the purpose of the new bill mentioned in tech news that aims to block online adult content?
questions.explain: The new bill intends to block both online adult content and the use of VPNs, aiming to regulate internet access more strictly.

questions.question: What is Microsoft doing with Foxconn's empty buildings?
choices: B. Turning them into a gaming studio
C. Creating a data center for AI
questions.explain: Microsoft plans to convert Foxconn's empty buildings into what it claims will be the 'world's most powerful' AI data center.
